review: They provide extra facilities to couples and take care of them in a good way. Location is very good and when it rains here it becomes more romantic. Good place to stay . Yup they also provide heli facilities.i would suggest to stay here.
name: Ashok tiwari

review: Bahut accha resort hai ... Mujhe yaha ki facilities and behaviour Sabse zyada acha Laga.. yaha ka khana bhi ekdm ghar jaisa hai .. helicopter facilities bhi yaha se bahut nazdik hai .....next time bhi Mai yahi stay karunga
name: Rahul shukla

review: I think this resort is very very familiar as its all the staffs including owner are very good in behavior and they treat their customers in a very well manner..... They try to provide facilities of every kind to the customers..
name: Preeti

review: Good resort for family ..........it is safe too as well as behaviour of staff and owner is very good.... Site is lovely and heli services are also provided by them........ I think it takes a reasonable price from their customers..
name: Rohit tiwari

review: last year I went in this resort with my girlfriend and I think this is the best resort for couples because they provide all the facilities that all the couples need including food room service etc. I think thwy can make it more better in future
name: devender yadav

review: They provide all kinds of facilities.. The best is helicopter booking facilites Free parking, room service, good food facilities, petty petty services including ironing, laundry etc. Are also provided.
name: Virender singg

review: i think its best resort at a reasonable price  Breakfast is also included in price  Parking facility , bathrooms , dining , room service and even petty services are provided Behaviour of owner and all the other staffs are also amazing
name: raghav karnataki

review: Staff are very familiar and the way they treat their customers is really amazing .. Room service and parking is also good. They have bathrooms attached with rooms that's the lovely thing that impressed me a lot
name: Raj kurmanchali
